item.description:
We have reservations for tables, please ask at the door where to be pointed. Be on time, seating first come first serve at these tables--!

We already had a recent successful Italian language meetup at the Asgard (but with a different group).

I will try to co-post this with one or both of two other Italian language groups. More details TBA.

(There is also a French language group meeting at the Asgard regularly that gets good reviews.) 

Tables are big & roomy & there is no pressure to order food.

The Asgard wants this on a Sunday or Tuesday. If this gets scheduled again I'll try & make sure it isn't on the same weekend as the Cafe Andala. If people don't like Tuesdays we can alternate with Sundays, and/or change the time.

group.name: The Boston Italian Language Meetup Group & Luned√¨ Italiano

item.name: Parliamo l'italiano all' Asgard Pub
